rotu_alias: # rotu_alias - alias of name to be used in "giveWeapon"
# acog - actual weapon with ACOG sight file name
# gl - actual weapon with grenade launcher file name
# grip - actual weapon with grip handle file name
# reflex - actual weapon with reflex sight file name
# silencer - actual weapon with silencer file name
# special - reserved but can be used to store other weapon file name
